title: Wall-mounted CD Player, "Muji", Designed 1999; manufactured 2013
description: White plastic square body with rounded corners; face pierced for speaker; large central circular indentation with reader having center spindle to recieve and play CD; white power cord hanging from center bottom acts as on/off pull switch.
